data.name: Mr. Ben B
data.title: This service saved us
data.text: We ran a Vehicle History Check and found out that the car we were trying to buy had been recently stolen. We immediately looked for another car which had clean history and we are really happy with it.

data.name: Mr. James B
data.title: A real time saver
data.text: I was looking for a car to purchase, ran a check and two cars I found online had major issues with them. It saved me from going all the way out to visit them and potentially making the mistake of buying one!

data.name: Mr. Faysal M
data.title: Great service, does what it says
data.text: I had no issues using this service, it was quick, effortless and the overall check is very comprehensive. Itâ€™s great peace of mind when you are paying so much to buy a car.
